title: Lbs to Stone Converter (and back) | Weight & Mass

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1 stone = 14 lb (exact) 1 lb = 0.45359237 kg (exact) 1 stone = 6.35029318 kg (exact) From pounds to stones: stones = pounds ÷ 14. Split as stones + lb: st = ⌊pounds ÷ 14⌋, lb_rem = pounds − 14×st. From stones + lb to pounds: pounds = 14×st + lb_rem. To kilograms: kg = pounds × 0.45359237.
